title: Adding a property `trainable` to `tf.Variable`
body_html:
Feature request: wouldn't be handy to have a property trainable in the class tf.Variable?

P.S. sorry in advance for the question but... am I supposed/entitled to sketch an implementation in my TF fork and then issue a pull request?
body_text:

P.S. sorry in advance for the question but... am I supposed/entitled to sketch an implementation in my TF fork and then issue a pull request?
body:
Feature request: wouldn't be handy to have a property `trainable` in the class `tf.Variable`?

P.S. sorry in advance for the question but... am I supposed/entitled to sketch an implementation in my TF fork and then issue a pull request?
